ministry.name: Men's Accountability Groups
ministry.overview: The men's accountability groups meet to provide men a place to form relationships while being discipled through teaching, accountability and prayer.

long-description.heading: Central
long-description.p: The men's accountability group meets every Tuesday morning at 6am at Seattle's Best Coffee at Parmer and IH35. We have a devotion with emphasis on application, then discuss whatever is going on in our lives. We close by sharing prayer requests and praying for each other. Relationships are formed, so if someone is struggling in a particular area that person can either bring the issue before the group or get together with one or two other men for counseling or discipleship.

long-description.heading: North
long-description.p: The men's accountability group meets 6:15am every Monday morning at the Cedar Perk Coffee and Cream Shop at Buttercup and 183 (200 Buttercup Creek Blvd. Ste. 123). Further info is forthcoming
